Message:
local player = game.Players.LocalPlayer
local character = player.Character or player.CharacterAdded:Wait()
local humanoidRootPart = character:WaitForChild("HumanoidRootPart")

local collected = 0
local maxBonds = 1000
local bondFolderName = "Bonds" -- Mude se a pasta tiver outro nome

-- Aguarda a pasta onde os bonds estão
local bondsFolder = workspace:WaitForChild(bondFolderName)

-- Função para teleportar até o bond
local function teleportToBond(bond)
	if bond and bond:IsA("Part") then
		humanoidRootPart.CFrame = bond.CFrame + Vector3.new(0, 3, 0)
		wait(0.2) -- Pequeno delay pra evitar bugs
	end
end

-- Loop para coletar bonds
for _, bond in ipairs(bondsFolder:GetChildren()) do
	if collected >= maxBonds then break end
	
	if bond:IsA("Part") and bond:FindFirstChild("TouchInterest") then
		teleportToBond(bond)
		collected += 1
	end
end

print("✅ Bonds coletados: " .. tostring(collected))
